title: kyeongsunkim
text:
Input parameters below for calculations
#| standalone: true
#| viewerHeight: 600
#| 
from shiny import reactive
from shiny.express import input, render, ui

@render.text
def txt1():
    return f'Foundation'


ui.input_numeric("D_f", "Diameter (m)", 8) 
ui.input_numeric("L_f", "Length (m)", 9.3) 
ui.input_numeric("t_f", "Thickness (mm)", 20) 
ui.input_numeric("E_f", "Young's modulus (GPa)", 210) 
ui.input_numeric("rho_f", "Density (kg/m3)", 7850) 


@render.text
def txt1():
    return f'Soil'

ui.input_numeric("rho_s", "Soil's Density (kg/m3)", 2000) 
ui.input_numeric("E_s", "Soil's Young's modulus at 1D depth (MPa)", 130) 
ui.input_numeric("v_s", "Soil's Poisson ratio", 130) 


@reactive.Calc
def x_times_2():
    val = input.D_f() * 2
    print(f"D_f times 2 =  {val}.")
    return val
